title: stop hating champion reworks, the only deleted champion in league was Karma and that's it..
body:
every other rework kept the champions the same, the only hardcore changes were the ultimates, like {{champion:78}} for example.

the VO and LORE are a different story, I like the new Poppy, but I also miss the old "no jokes man". but to say she was deleted? no.. that's to much. all these champion mains talking shit because their champions were changed.

did you really enjoy playing old useless {{champion:19}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:266}} ?????????? because they were shit. OMG new AAtrox sucks!!, he always sucked because we always had {{champion:11}} {{champion:23}}  Aatrox is just a poor version..

http://pre00.deviantart.net/bdc0/th/pre/i/2015/315/9/d/citrus_mood_by_ayyasap-d9gadvh.jpg
